card.text: Take an extra turn after this one.

card.text: Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Jeweled Lotus
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Jeweled Lotus: Add three mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast your commander.

card.name: The Ur-Dragon
card.text: Eminence — As long as The Ur-Dragon is in the command zone or on the battlefield, other Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.FlyingWhenever one or more Dragons you control attack, draw that many cards, then you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: The Ur-Dragon
card.text: Eminence — As long as The Ur-Dragon is in the command zone or on the battlefield, other Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.FlyingWhenever one or more Dragons you control attack, draw that many cards, then you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: The Ur-Dragon
card.text: Eminence — As long as The Ur-Dragon is in the command zone or on the battlefield, other Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.FlyingWhenever one or more Dragons you control attack, draw that many cards, then you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: The Kenriths' Royal Funeral
card.text: When The Kenriths' Royal Funeral enters the battlefield, exile up to two target legendary creature cards from your graveyard. You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the greatest mana value among cards exiled this way.Legendary spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each card exiled with The Kenriths' Royal Funeral.

card.name: Atraxa, Praetors' Voice
card.text: Flying, vigilance, deathtouch, lifelinkAt the beginning of your end step, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer
card.text: Whenever Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token and exile the top card of that player's library. Until end of turn, you may cast that card.Dash {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

card.name: Goro-Goro and Satoru
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control that entered the battlefield this turn deal combat damage to a player, create a 5/5 red Dragon Spirit creature token with flying.{1}{R}: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Goro-Goro and Satoru
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control that entered the battlefield this turn deal combat damage to a player, create a 5/5 red Dragon Spirit creature token with flying.{1}{R}: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Isle of Vesuva
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, its controller creates a token that's a copy of that creature.Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, destroy target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature.

card.name: Katilda and Lier
card.text: Whenever you cast a Human spell, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Katilda and Lier
card.text: Whenever you cast a Human spell, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Slimefoot and Squee
card.text: Whenever Slimefoot and Squee enters the battlefield or attacks, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.{1}{B}{R}{G}, Sacrifice a Saproling: Return Slimefoot and Squee and up to one other target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Slimefoot and Squee
card.text: Whenever Slimefoot and Squee enters the battlefield or attacks, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.{1}{B}{R}{G}, Sacrifice a Saproling: Return Slimefoot and Squee and up to one other target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Spatial Merging
card.text: When you encounter Spatial Merging, reveal cards from the top of your planar deck until you reveal two plane cards. Simultaneously planeswalk to both of them. Put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your planar deck in any order.

card.name: Towashi
card.text: Modified creatures you control have trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, draw a card." (Equipment, Auras you control,a nd counters are modifications.)Whenever Chaos ensues, distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures you control.

card.name: Bloodfell Caves
card.text: Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield tapped.When Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

card.name: Blossoming Sands
card.text: Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield tapped.When Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

card.name: Breach the Multiverse
card.text: Each player mills ten cards. For each player, choose a creature or planeswalker card in that player's graveyard. Put those cards onto the battlefield under your control. Then each creature you control becomes a Phyrexian in addition to its other types.

card.name: Breach the Multiverse
card.text: Each player mills ten cards. For each player, choose a creature or planeswalker card in that player's graveyard. Put those cards onto the battlefield under your control. Then each creature you control becomes a Phyrexian in addition to its other types.

card.name: Chandra, Hope's Beacon
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. This ability triggers only once each turn.+2: Add two mana in any combination of colors.+1: Exile the top five cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from among those exiled cards.−X: Chandra, Hope's Beacon deals X damage to each of up to two targets.

card.text: Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield tapped.When Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

card.name: Drana and Linvala
card.text: Flying, vigilanceActivated abilities of creatures your opponents control can't be activated.Drana and Linvala has all activated abilities of all creatures your opponents control. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to activate those abilities.

card.name: Faerie Mastermind
card.text: FlashFlyingWhenever an opponent draws their second card each turn, you draw a card.{3}{U}: Each player draws a card.

card.text: FlashFlyingWhenever an opponent draws their second card each turn, you draw a card.{3}{U}: Each player draws a card.

card.name: Ghalta and Mavren

card.name: Heliod, the Radiant Dawn
card.text: When Heliod, the Radiant Dawn enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card that isn't a God from your graveyard to your hand.{3}{U/P}: Transform Heliod, the Radiant Dawn. Activate only as a sorcery. ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)

card.text: You may cast spells as though they had flash.Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each card your opponents have drawn this turn.

card.name: Jin-Gitaxias
card.text: Ward {2}Whenever you cast a noncreature spell with mana value 3 or greater, draw a card.{3}{U}: Exile Jin-Gitaxias, then return it to the battlefield transformed under its owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery and only if you have seven or more cards in hand.

card.name: The Great Synthesis
card.text: (As this saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)I — Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your hand. You have no maximum hand size for as long as you control The Great Synthesis.II — Return all non-Phyrexian creatures to their owners' hands.III — You may cast any number of spells from your hand without paying their mana costs. Exile The Great Synthesis, then return it to the battlefield (front face up).

card.text: Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield tapped.When Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

card.name: Moment of Truth
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one into your graveyard, and one on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Omnath, Locus of All
card.text: If you would lose unspent mana, that mana becomes black instead.At the beginning of your precombat main phase, look at the top card of your library. You may reveal that card if it has three or more colored mana symbols in its mana cost. If you do, add three mana in any combination of its colors and put it into your hand. If you don't reveal it, put it into your hand.

card.name: Relentless Dead
card.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)When Relentless Dead dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, return it to its owner's hand.When Relentless Dead dies, you may pay {X}. If you do, return another target Zombie creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Sigarda's Aid
card.text: You may cast Aura and Equipment spells as though they had flash.Whenever an Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach it to target creature you control.

card.name: Thing in the Ice
card.text: DefenderThing in the Ice enters the battlefield with four ice counters on it.Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, remove an ice counter from Thing in the Ice. Then if it has no ice counters on it, transform it.

card.name: Awoken Horror
card.text: When this creature transforms into Awoken Horror, return all non-Horror creatures to their owners' hands.
